description: 4.5 is my entry for the Ludum Dare 37 game jam, the theme of which is "one room". It is a memory game, in which you are trapped in a room that repeats itself over and over again, each time adding a new object. Aside from the room itself (not the objects in it), all 3D assets were obtained from Unity's Asset Store. The game is controlled with a keyboard and mouse.
